name: Robo-Jam
description:
Welcome to Robo-Jam, the first game we've developed, made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

The theme for this jam was Out of Control, and as such, you must jump and run through this platformer while hacking robots and removing certain functions to send them out of control!

We sincerely hope you enjoy playing, as we've had a blast making it.

James Galvin, James Marsden and Michael Galvin.

Both Robo-Jam.exe and Robo-Jam.pck are required for the game to run. A zip file is provided for ease of use.
